tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE activity_recommendations (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    recommended_age_group VARCHAR(50),
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Accommodations (
    accom_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    accom_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Activities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE Recommendations (
    rec_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    accom_id UUID REFERENCES Accommodations(accom_id),
    activity_id UUID REFERENCES Activities(activity_id),
    rating FLOAT,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE Travelers (
    traveler_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    traveler_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT
)

CREATE TABLE accommodations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    accommodation_id INT,
    activity_id INT,
    rating INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (accommodation_id) REFERENCES accommodations(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES activities(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    recommendation_id INT,
    rating INT,
    comment TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (recommendation_id) REFERENCES recommendations(id)
);
